javelin.model.world

Class Town

  • java.lang.Object
    • javelin.model.world.Town
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, WorldActor

    public class Town
extends java.lang.Object
implements WorldActor
    A hub for upgrading units, resting, participating in tournament, renting transportation, buying items... Each town has it's own profile which is predetermined.
    Author:
    alex
    See Also:
